General.Name: Alpine Summit Energy Partners Inc.
General.Description: Alpine Summit Energy Partners, Inc. operates as an energy developer in the United States. It has various oil and gas assets in the Austin Chalk and Eagle Ford formations in the Giddings Field and the Hawkville Field, Austin. The company was founded in 2018 and is headquartered in Nashville, Tennessee. On July 5, 2023, Alpine Summit Energy Partners, Inc., along with its affiliates, filed a voluntary petition for reorganization under Chapter 11 in the U.S. Bankruptcy Court for the Southern District of Texas.
General.Address: 3322 West End Avenue, Nashville, TN, United States, 37203
